FuncDef: The display dpfr cache command displays the fault table. The display dpfr cache command displays the fault table. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 address.
It is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Specifies a chip ID.
The value is an integer. The default value is 0.
